about.name: Jai Singh
about.bio: Computer Science Engineering Student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Passionate about full stack development, building AI-powered applications, and contributing to innovative projects. Looking forward to gaining more work experience as an intern.

experience.description: Developed and maintained frontend components using React.js and Tailwind CSS. Implemented RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js. Worked with MongoDB for database operations including CRUD functionality and schema design. Collaborated using Git & GitHub following agile workflows.

projects.title: Portfolio Website with Admin Panel
projects.description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects, blogs, and contact details with dynamic content management
features: Admin panel for dynamic content management

projects.title: AI Astrology Chatbot
projects.description: AI-powered astrology chatbot platform integrating Llama model for personalized interactions

projects.title: Customer Ledger App
projects.description: Progressive web app for managing customer transactions with role-based access control, similar to OkCredit

projects.title: Crop Recommendation System
projects.description: Machine learning-based application suggesting optimal crops based on soil and weather data
